title: Customized Mobile Learning System-Based Language Proficiency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Language Proficiency and Ability to Use Digital Devices Fundamentally
context.additional_context: Workplace-Integrated Language Learning Needs in Smartphone-Centric Restricted Technology Environments

learning_goals: Learners can accurately select context-aware, customized language content for work situations with over 80% accuracy.
Learners perform self-directed language learning via a mobile system at least three times weekly and incorporate real-time feedback.
Learners can solve over 70% of job-related language application problems by the end of the course.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
